title: Restaurant Review: Dunya Kabab House Stands Up for Afghan Culture
description: A new restaurant in Brooklyn was conceived as a kind of rebuttal to Taliban rule.
dc:creator: Pete Wells
media:credit: Emon Hassan for The New York Times
media:description: In Afghanistan, lamb korma, stewed greens and long-grained basmati rice are a popular combination. Dunya Kabab House was opened in part to showcase such Afghan dishes in Brooklyn.
